name: Frost Curse Demo
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------

Annotation

Freezing hero embarks on a dangerous journey through the ruins of an ancient kingdom in hope of breaking the deadly frost curse.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Developer message:

Hello everyone, TopRofler is on touch!

Frost Curse is my first game and the fulfillment of my dream to contribute to the gaming industry. And although the development is far from complete, I am proud to present the demo to the public. I hope you take your time to play my game and share your opinion in the comments.

Heve fun and stay warm!

--------------------------------------------------------------
